evidence: I like the LED's
review_text: I like the LED's.  For a safety light,  when the power goes out, you can't beat the price.  It doesn't take a special battery as the ad suggest.  A standard 6V square battery is just fine.  Because it's LED, the battery will last a whole lot longer.  The case is a little flimsy and not waterproof, but you can't expect everything for the price. That's the only reason for the 4 star rating

evidence: This flashlight features an array of several LED light sources
review_text: This flashlight features an array of several LED light sources, which promises better service life than standard flashlight incandescent bulb.  The first unit bought from Amazon arrived with a cracked housing, which they cheerfully replaced in 2 days, and they told me to keep the cracked unit (for spare parts?).  Thanks, Amazon !

evidence: I like the LED
review_text: as advertised and I like the LED

evidence: it lit up the whole room
review_text: We used it one night when the power went out and it lit up the whole room. We bought it for the hurricane but thnkfully it didnt hit us!

evidence: worked great for 1 month
review_title: worked great for 1 month then stopped working
review_text: worked great for 1 month then stopped working. spent money on a new battery but that wasn't the problem. problem is this product is crap.

evidence: says it will last 30 hours.
review_title: Wimpy light. Amazon can't seem to deliver accurately these days
review_text: Amazon listing indicated 10 LED flashlight that would last 45 hours. I received a 7 LED flashlight that says it will last 30 hours.  I wasn't expecting an awesome flashlight at $5, but I was expecting to at least get what I ordered. Second mess up from Amazon in as many weeks.

evidence: One lantern works great! It's really bright and doesn't flicker.
review_title: Works great with a working battery
review_text: I ordered two of these - one for each of our cars. One lantern works great! It's really bright and doesn't flicker. The other lantern is very DIM and flickers, so I can only assume the battery is faulty, bc I tried the battery in both lanterns, and they both were dim. I don't think I should have to pay for another battery out of my pocket, since I already paid for one! So we'll see what the company says. I'd give this rating 5 stars if the battery actually worked.

evidence: 6v will last for awhile
review_text: This lantern is excellent!! Bright and lights big area!! 6v will last for awhile! Those AAA ones just eat batteries!!!!!!!

evidence: The cost of this lantern is less expensive than just a battery.
review_title: It is a bargain for the price.
review_text: I did not expect much since it was so inexpensive but I was pleasantly surprised.  It is bright.  I mean BRIGHT.  The power goes off here in Fl. often and I can always find it due to the size.  I ought to buy more one for every room.  The cost of this lantern is less expensive than just a battery.  The seller was easy to deal with.  The first one was defective and he replaced it right away.

evidence: because the price was so good
review_text: Got this lantern because the price was so good - recommending it because it is so lightweight and powerful! Everyone needs a backup light- this is the perfect one! Can't beat the price

evidence: Great Light for price!
review_text: Nice brightness, alot brighter than the reviews lead me to believe. Nice cool white light, no warm yellow tone. Awesome for the price. Recommend it to anyone!

evidence: The price makes possible to keep a few extra...
review_title: Buy a few.  Well worth the money!!!
review_text: Very good product for the money.  Bright, strong light.  I would say everyone should have a few of these in the house just in case the electricity goes out and in your car in case your break down somewhere.  Also good for working in dark spaces.  The price makes possible to keep a few extra.  When the electricity went out from the last storm, I was able to give a couple to my neighbor and it wasn’t a big hit to my pocket and they were so greatful to have a source of light at night.

evidence: terribly cheap plastic.
review_text: First on arrived cracked. Replacement arrived cracked. Will tape and keep as at least I have the battery and it works... terribly cheap plastic.

evidence: This is very lightweight and is made of a cheaper plastic.
review_text:
I have tried every angle imaginable of positions for the batter pack, but alas, I cannot get this to turn on. Not sure if it’s a bad battery or bad connection.

This is very lightweight and is made of a cheaper plastic. If it turned on, I wouldn’t have any complaints.

But I can’t use a flashlight that doesn't have a light..

After reading other reviews, I wouldn’t purchase another one.

evidence: I came online and read a review from someone who said there's a cone over one of the connectors that has to be removed. I had thought it was part of the battery and didn't realize it needed to come off. It finally works.
review_text: I could not get this to work and was ready to throw it out and take the loss.  I came online and read a review from someone who said there's a cone over one of the connectors that has to be removed.  I had thought it was part of the battery and didn't realize it needed to come off.  It finally works.

evidence: The product description clearly states, in two different places, this lantern comes with an alkaline battery. It does not.
review_text: The product description clearly states, in two different places, this lantern comes with an alkaline battery.  It does not.  It doesn't even come with a heavy duty battery.  The price is good, the lantern is OK quality, but I just don't like being lied to.  I'm not going to go to the trouble of returning it as it does work.  I guess I'll just dig a little deeper into the reviews before I purchase things in the future.  I was in a hurry so I didn't get as much information as I should have.  My mistake.

evidence: 2 quit working almost immediately
review_title: I bought 4 of these. 2 quit working almost ...
review_text:
I bought 4 of these. 2 quit working almost immediately And the other two had to be "altered by bending prongs up" to get to work. See how long they work.
Not worth the money if you need a dependable light.
